metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0294 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
GnuTLS before 3.3.13 does not validate that the signature algorithms match when importing a certificate.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0294` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnutls-bin - 3.3.8-3ubuntu3
guile-gnutls - 3.3.8-3ubuntu3
libgnutls-openssl27 - 3.3.8-3ubuntu3
libgnutls30 - 3.3.8-3ubuntu3
libgnutlsxx28 - 3.3.8-3ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnutls28 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.3.8-3ubuntu3').
